title: Hamster Factory ASMR
description: Hamster Factory ASMR is a delightful clicker idle game that puts you in charge of a hamster wheel, and every spin gets you a monetary reward. The wheel is filled with hardworking, adorable hamsters. Your mission is to manage the hamsters as they spin wheels to generate income, all the while creating the most productive and efficient factory possible. Get ready to build the ultimate hamster-powered factory in Hamster Factory ASMR!
